class.name: AdServer
class.brief_description: The AdServer is a low-level interface with the Ramtak Mobile Studio advertisement system.
class.description: While it is possible to use AdServer as a user, it's much more ergonomic to use the AdController and BannerAdController nodes.

method.name: get_available_plugins
method.description: Regurns a list of available plugins in the current build.

method.name: get_plugin_priority_order
method.description: Returns the current priority order of advertisement plugins.

method.name: set_plugin_priority_order
method.description: Sets the priority order of advertisement plugins.

signal.name: ad_clicked
signal.description: Emitted whenever an advertisement is clicked. You probobaly want to be using the AdController/BannerAdController version of this signal.

signal.name: ad_closed
signal.description: Emitted whenever an advertisement is closed. You probobaly want to be using the AdController/BannerAdController version of this signal.

signal.name: ad_error
signal.description: Emitted whenever an advertisement has an error. You probobaly want to be using the AdController/BannerAdController version of this signal.

signal.name: ad_loaded
signal.description: Emitted whenever an advertisement is loaded. You probobaly want to be using the AdController/BannerAdController version of this signal.

signal.name: ad_reward_earned
signal.description: Emitted whenever an advertisement reward is earned by the user. You probobaly want to be using the AdController/BannerAdController version of this signal.

signal.name: ad_shown
signal.description: Emitted whenever an advertisement is shown. You probobaly want to be using the AdController/BannerAdController version of this signal.
